user_question: How can I grow a Venus flytrap indoors and generate an image of a thriving Venus flytrap?
final_answer: To grow a Venus flytrap indoors, provide bright, indirect sunlight, use distilled water, maintain high humidity, and plant in a mix of sphagnum moss and sand. Image of a thriving Venus flytrap generated. Use a plastic or glazed ceramic pot with drainage holes.
